subtitle: This recipe uses ready-to-bake croissant dough, so preparation is minimal.

method.text: Preheat oven to temperature specified on the croissant dough pack.
Mix together the apple slices, cinnamon and caster sugar.
Open the can of croissant dough as instructed. Carefully separate the dough along the perforations to give you 6 triangles.
Divide the apple mixture between the dough triangles. Roll up the dough to form crescent shapes.

Place the croissants on a lightly greased baking tray. Brush with beaten egg and cook according to pack instructions - approx 15-20 min until risen and golden. Brush with the warmed honey and serve immediately.

title: Apple and cinnamon croissants
